name: Angry Burst
description:
ANGRY BURST Platform: WebGL / Android
Build: Unity3D

Let's take your anger out. Angry Burst is a very simple clicker game by lets you press the vent button until you're satisfied. Hope you have a better mood after playing the game.

GAMEPLAY Choose your anger level Hit the blue button as fast as possible until the time runs out Shows measured anger results SPECIAL THANKS
